news: After Acro's departure, a new prisoner, Malzy_Mutt, has entered soyjak.blog's Vantablack Asylum. Staff members and users alike are quick to bully him. Some speculate that this feral beast will not last long as he has already garnered negative 1 billion reaction score. Will Malzy_Mutt survive in a hostile non affirming non validating atmosphere? Or will he crush under the pressure of the BIG BUDDY, who's always watching...
